thread.title: Four Seasons Hotel Hangzhou at West Lake Invites Guests on a Culinary Tour of Malaysia with Special Guest Chef Zaihari ZainolTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Four Seasons Hotel Hangzhou at West Lake Invites Guests on a Culinary Tour of Malaysia with Special Guest Chef Zaihari ZainolTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Four Seasons Hotel Hangzhou at West Lake Invites Guests on a Culinary Tour of Malaysia with Special Guest Chef Zaihari ZainolTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Four Seasons Hotel Hangzhou at West Lake Invites Guests on a Culinary Tour of Malaysia with Special Guest Chef Zaihari Zainol
With its lakeside setting amid the beautiful gardens of Four Seasons Hotel Hangzhou at West Lake, WL Bistro is a celebration of Asian fare for both local residents and Hotel guests. Not content to simply offer a range of dishes native to Thailand, Singapore, Japan and beyond, Executive Chef Tommy Zhu seeks authenticity in his menu, with a modern twist on traditional dishes and an emphasis on top quality seasonal produce.
Now, WL Bistro invites guests on a culinary tour of Malaysia with an exploration of cuisine characterised by distinct flavours and precise preparation. Joining Chef Tommy for this special promotion is renowned Chef Zaihari Zainol from Four Seasons Resort Langkawi in Malaysia.
From September 19 to 27, 2015, Chef Zaihari Zainol will prepare a special Malaysian set menu as well as a la carte choices at WL Bistro, including several of his signature dishes. Guests may choose the delicate fried fish with honey tamarind sauce, and beef lovers will delight in Chef Zaihari Zainol’s beef rendang, and everyone will want to try his signature crab curry with pineapple.
Whether enjoying a lively lunch with friends on the sprawling garden terrace or bringing family together for a relaxed dinner inside in the light and cosy atmosphere, this special Malaysian menu at WL Bistro will be one to remember as Chef Zaihari Zainol personally visits tables to meet guests and share his culinary secrets.
About WL Bistro
WL Bistro is adjacent to the lobby of Four Seasons Hotel Hangzhou at West Lake and is open daily from 6:30 am to 10:00 pm. In addition to this special Malaysian promotion from September 19 to 27, WL Bistro presents a menu inspired by the finest quality seasonal produce and the unique flavours and regional dishes of Asia, paired with one of the China Sommelier Association’s China’s Wine Lists of the Year 2015.
About Chef Zaihari Zainol
Chef Zaihari Zainol, fondly known as Zack, is the Executive Sous Chef of Four Seasons Resort Langkawi, Malaysia since 2004. His inspiration for cooking came from his brothers who are a successful executive chefs and his great grandmother who was the personal cook at the one of the Kedah royal family households. From humble beginnings in Paya Jaras, Sungai Buloh, Selangor (Malaysia) his culinary journey has taken him to places as far as Dubai while working at a five-star hotel in which he won a Gold Medal for The Emirates Salon Culinaire in 1993.
By his tireless enterprising and rich experience, Chef Zack has laid a solid foundation for himself to join inFour Seasons Resort Langkawi in Malaysia and write a new chapter of his gastronomic tour in the picturesque Langkawi.
About Executive Chef Tommy Zhu
With a resume that includes international stops in Germany and Jakarta, Shanghai-born Tommy Zhu brings a world of culinary experience to Four Seasons Hotel Hangzhou at West Lake, including its award-winning Chinese restaurant Jin Sha. With his recent recrafting of the WL Bistro menu to encompass a broad spectrum of Asian dishes, Chef Tommy and his team continue to explore regional flavours and to be inspired by the beauty of the West Lake region, to the great delight of their guests.
Sour:- Four Seasons
